# context_stream_chunk

The `ContextStreamChunk` class for handling streamed chunks from contextual LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/context_stream_chunk/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/context_stream_chunk/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/context_stream_chunk/index" symbolName="ContextStreamChunk" /> ContextStreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from a contextual LLM call.
